text: I have updated the scripts quite well such that it is very easy to onboard new users. However, the backend needs to have these new users in its .env, and a restart.... i wonder if we can come up with something better

elements.text: I have updated the scripts quite well such that it is very easy to onboard new users. However, the backend needs to have these new users in its .env, and a restart.... i wonder if we can come up with something better

text: It's very sensitive data, so we can't just serve it from an API :smile: unless its also very very very secure

elements.text: It's very sensitive data, so we can't just serve it from an API
unless its also very very very secure

text: AWS has a KMS what we can use to encrypt those. After when the backend gets the encrypted data it just goes to the KMS to decrypt it. So the sensitive data will only remain in the memory.

elements.text: AWS has a KMS what we can use to encrypt those. After when the backend gets the encrypted data it just goes to the KMS to decrypt it. So the sensitive data will only remain in the memory.

text:
I just modified the logging:
```2025/07/19 12:45:10 WARN Not enough funds to transfer username=trize amount=1.1416666666666666
2025/07/19 12:45:11 WARN Not enough funds to transfer username=unlockit amount=1.1416666666666666
2025/07/19 12:45:15 INFO Transfer successful username=xbto amount=0.14807820699075
2025/07/19 12:45:15 ERROR Error in PeriodicCaller while getting user error="user not found" username=3trade-minter
2025/07/19 12:45:16 WARN Not enough funds to transfer username=brikly-minter amount=1.9027777777777777
2025/07/19 12:45:18 WARN Not enough funds to transfer username=foundinals-minter amount=1.9027777777777777
2025/07/19 12:45:19 WARN Not enough funds to transfer username=obsidian-minter amount=1.9027777777777777```
• So there is only one Info log if the transaction succeed.
• There is a warning if there is no fund on the user. This can be useful so we can set Alert for that. So if we try to charge the user bu there isn't fund.
• All other cases we can get an error. 
I will push it soon.

elements.text: I just modified the logging:

2025/07/19 12:45:10 WARN Not enough funds to transfer username=trize amount=1.1416666666666666
2025/07/19 12:45:11 WARN Not enough funds to transfer username=unlockit amount=1.1416666666666666
2025/07/19 12:45:15 INFO Transfer successful username=xbto amount=0.14807820699075
2025/07/19 12:45:15 ERROR Error in PeriodicCaller while getting user error="user not found" username=3trade-minter
2025/07/19 12:45:16 WARN Not enough funds to transfer username=brikly-minter amount=1.9027777777777777
2025/07/19 12:45:18 WARN Not enough funds to transfer username=foundinals-minter amount=1.9027777777777777
2025/07/19 12:45:19 WARN Not enough funds to transfer username=obsidian-minter amount=1.9027777777777777
So there is only one Info log if the transaction succeed.
There is a warning if there is no fund on the user. This can be useful so we can set Alert for that. So if we try to charge the user bu there isn't fund.
All other cases we can get an error.
I will push it soon.

text:
Btw, <@U088UV6MKFE> does the Canton API allow for updating the annotations / metadata on a party? We could create a CRUD UI for parties that our team can access. maybe it would also allow for viewing their wallet balance without giving control.

Would be great if it also could show associated rewards, and maybe the user could view that data about their account too. Or as Aki thought, maybe all that data is public.
